languages.text: {n}Во взгляде техножреца, взирающего на творящееся богохульство, написана мука.{/n} "Омниссия, помилуй нас за столь грубое попрание ритуала эксплуатации. Повторяй литанию за мной и активируй командные руны, на которые я указываю". {n}Вокс Паскаля начинает мрачно хрипеть священные слова.{/n}

{n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Во взгляде техножреца, взирающего на творящееся богохульство, написана мука.{/n} "Омниссия, помилуй нас за столь грубое попрание ритуала эксплуатации. Повторяй литанию за мной и активируй командные руны, на которые я указываю". {n}Вокс Паскаля начинает мрачно хрипеть священные слова.{/n}

Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schmerz steht dem Techpriester in die Augen geschrieben, als er das Sakrileg mitansieht.{/n} "Vergib uns diesen eklatanten Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual, Omnissiah. Sprecht mir die Litanei nach und aktiviert die Befehlsrunen, auf die ich deute." {n}Pasqals Vox beginnt mit düsterem, heiserem Ton, die heiligen Worte zu rezitieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schmerz steht dem Techpriester in die Augen geschrieben, als er das Sakrileg mitansieht.{/n} "Vergib uns diesen eklatanten Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual, Omnissiah. Sprecht mir die Litanei nach und aktiviert die Befehlsrunen, auf die ich deute." {n}Pasqals Vox beginnt mit düsterem, heiserem Ton, die heiligen Worte zu rezitieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devant un tel sacrilège, le regard du technoprêtre laisse paraître une douleur bien visible.{/n} « Ô Omnimessie... Pardonne-nous pour cette profanation grossière du Rite d'Opération. Répétez la litanie après moi et activez les runes de contrôle que je vous indiquerai. » {n}Le vox de Pasqal se met à réciter les paroles sacrées d'un ton rauque et sinistre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Devant un tel sacrilège, le regard du technoprêtre laisse paraître une douleur bien visible.{/n} « Ô Omnimessie... Pardonne-nous pour cette profanation grossière du Rite d'Opération. Répétez la litanie après moi et activez les runes de contrôle que je vous indiquerai. » {n}Le vox de Pasqal se met à réciter les paroles sacrées d'un ton rauque et sinistre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}看到这样的亵渎行为，帕斯卡眼中明显流露着痛苦之意。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚，请原谅我们如此粗暴地违反行操作仪典。请跟着我念这段祷文，激活我指定的指挥符文。”{n}帕斯卡开始以阴沉嘶哑的声音诵念起神圣的祷词。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看到这样的亵渎行为，帕斯卡眼中明显流露着痛苦之意。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚，请原谅我们如此粗暴地违反行操作仪典。请跟着我念这段祷文，激活我指定的指挥符文。”{n}帕斯卡开始以阴沉嘶哑的声音诵念起神圣的祷词。{/n}

languages.text: {n}冒涜行為を見て、技術司祭の目に苦痛の色が滲む。{/n}「万機神よ、任務の儀礼に対するこのような重大な違反をお許しください。自分の後に連祷を繰り返してください。指し示すコマンドルーンを起動する」{n}パスカルのヴォクスは暗く掠れた音で、神聖な言葉を唱え始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冒涜行為を見て、技術司祭の目に苦痛の色が滲む。{/n}「万機神よ、稼働の儀式に対するこのような重い違反をお許しください。私の後に連祷を繰り返せ。指し示すコマンドルーンを起動する」{n}パスカルのヴォクスは暗く掠れた音で、神聖な言葉を唱え始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El dolor es visible en los ojos del Tecnosacerdote cuando contempla el sacrilegio.{/n} «Perdónanos, Omnissiah, por una violación tan grave del Rito de Operación. Repita la letanía después de mí y active las runas de mando que señalo». {n}El voco de Pasqal comienza a recitar las palabras sagradas, lúgubre y roncamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dolor es visible en los ojos del Tecnosacerdote cuando contempla el sacrilegio.{/n} «Perdónanos, Omnissiah, por una violación tan grave del Rito de Operación. Repita la letanía después de mí y active las runas de mando que señalo». {n}El voco de Pasqal comienza a recitar las palabras sagradas, lúgubre y roncamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in bu hürmetsizlik karşısında hissettiği ızdırap, gözlerinden okunuyor.{/n} "Ey Hermesih, Faaliyet Ayini'ni böyle hadsizce ihlal ettiğimiz için bizi bağışla. İlahiyi peşimden söyleyin ve gösterdiğim komuta rünlerini etkinleştirin." {n}Kutsal sözler, Pasqal'ın voksundan hırıltılı ve kasvet dolu bir sesle dökülmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pain is visible in the Tech-Priest's eyes as he looks upon the sacrilege.{/n} "Forgive us, Omnissiah, for such a gross violation of the Rite of Operation. Repeat the litany after me and activate the command runes I point to." {n}Pasqal's vox starts reciting the sacred words, gloomily and hoarsely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in bu küfür karşısında hissettiği keder, gözlerinde tezahür ediyor.{/n} "Bağışla bizi Hermesih, Faaliyet Ayini'ni hadsizce ihlal ettik. İlahiyi peşimden söyleyin ve gösterdiğim komuta rünlerini etkinleştirin." {n}Kutsal sözler, Pasqal'ın voksundan hırıltılı ve kasvet dolu bir sesle yükseliyor.{/n}
